::Cerberus::

    He looks back and sees the others moving away. He motione=
d for them to follow. Then he turns back to looking forward and sees anothe=
r bot doing a backwards jump onto some rocks. He saw the claws on the bots =
hands. "Impressive claws," He called out. "This bot is taking me to Shredde=
r, you wouldn't wish to join us would you?"
  ----- Original Message ----- =

  From: ilovealllizards 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Tuesday, Octobe=
r 17, 2000 7:09 PM
  Subject: Re: Destrons


  Mantella




  *Mantella did=
n't like this. She wasn't made to build, repair or invent, but
  to destroy=
. She felt hatred for the idea of creating. She starts shaking.
  She grabs=
 a stick while looking at it. She snarls and her optics grow red.
  She bli=
nks and then breaks the stick in half. She starts breathing rapidly.
  She =
wondered where Magmatron was. He wanted her to fight. Shredder was
  differ=
ent. She did have deep feelings for Shredder, and wouldn't just run
  off b=
ut she was losing her temper.*



  Mantella: "One made to destroy not crea=
t..."



  *Mantella says as she stares. She throws herself backwards on so=
me rocks and
  growls as she stares at the sky.*

  ----- Original Message =
-----
  From: <Yanshosh@...>
  To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
  Sent: Monday,=
 October 16, 2000 9:25 AM
  Subject: Destrons


  > ::Shredder::
  >
  > Sh=
redder turns his head toward the scanners as he sees the aproaching
  bots,=

  > jumping up as one enters the base and destroys something.
  >
  > "Hey=
!" he yells, running out of the base, "What's the meaning of this? I
  > th=
ought you were Destron?"
  >
  >
  >
  >


        eGroups Sponsor 
       =
